Anticipation Tactics.name: Anticipation Tactics
Anticipation Tactics.flavor: Your tactical intuition places your ally just where he or she needs to be.
Anticipation Tactics.trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you makes a melee attack
Anticipation Tactics.target: One or two allies in the burst or you and one ally in the burst
Anticipation Tactics.effect: Each target can use a free action to shift 2 squares and make a basic attack against the triggering enemy.

Combined Effort.name: Combined Effort
Combined Effort.flavor: Drawing from your alliesâ€™ perceptions, you discern the best place to strike.
Combined Effort.attack: Charisma vs. AC. You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each ally within 2 squares of the target.
Combined Effort.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Combined Effort.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Insightful Command.name: Insightful Command
Insightful Command.flavor: You exhort your allies to move to new positions or to defend themselves.
Insightful Command.target: You and each ally in the burst
Insightful Command.effect: Each target can either shift half his or her speed as a free action or gain a +3 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
